Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between Rosemont and Harlem(OH)
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to a police investigation at Cumberland; board all trains on the Forest Park-bound side at Cumberland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Blue Line is experiencing delays due to a police investigation at Cumberland.

Board/exit all trains on the Forest Park-bound side of the platform at the Cumberland station.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
